head.title: Add Image Signatures to {{FileFormatUp}} Files Using {{ProgLang}} Applications
head.description: The {{ProgLang}} API allows you to add image signatures to {{FileFormatUp}} files. Easily insert images into PDFs, Word documents, Excel sheets, presentations, and more.

header.title: Add Image Signatures to {{FileFormatUp}} Using {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to add images to a variety of office document formats, including PDFs, Word, Excel, and image files.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: Discover {{ProdFullName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) offers the ability to add image signatures to any page and position within business documents. Streamline your workflows by adding images to PDFs, Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, and popular image formats.

formats.title: Add Images to Other File Formats
formats.description: With the {{EnvName}} API, you can insert supported image formats into various documents. Easily resize, choose position, and add image signatures to your documents.

more_features.title: Comprehensive Document Signing Solution
more_features.description: Our API supports a range of signing features, allowing you to add, modify, delete, search, and verify multiple signature types, including image signatures.

feature_1.title: Insert Images into Office Documents
feature_1.content: Effortlessly place image signatures in any position on any page of a document. Enrich your content with text, images, barcodes, metadata, and digital certificates.

feature_2.title: Signature Search and Verification
feature_2.content: Easily verify the validity of signatures in signed documents. Retrieve a list of all signatures within a document and check detailed information about each one.

feature_3.title: Modify Signatures
feature_3.content: Update the content, appearance, size, or position of any signature previously added to a document. Our API makes modifying signatures simple and efficient.

feature_4.title: Remove Unnecessary Signatures
feature_4.content: Our API supports full CRUD operations for most signature types. You can easily remove signatures from nearly all supported document types when necessary.
